mrmc.core

Class StatTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • mrmc.core.StatTest

  • public class StatTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Statistical calculations on study data. Hillis tests and Z test are implemented Hillis tests require non-central F distribution. The formula is from http://www.mathworks.com/help/toolbox/stats/brn2ivz-110.html
    Version:
    2.0b
    Author:
    Xin He, Ph.D,, Brandon D. Gallas, Ph.D, Rohan Pathare

    • Constructor Detail

      • StatTest

        public StatTest(double[] DBMvar,
        int r,
        int n,
        int d,
        double sig,
        double eff,
        double totalVar,
        double[][] BCKbias)
        Constructor used for calculating statistics when sizing a new trial
        Parameters:
        DBMvar - Subset of DBM variance components for the selected modality/difference
        r - Number of readers
        n - Number of normal cases
        d - Number of disease cases
        sig - Significance level
        eff - Effect size
        totalVar - Total variance of components
        BCKbias - Biased BCK variance components

      • StatTest

        public StatTest(DBRecord curRecord,
        int selectedMod,
        int useBiasM,
        double sig,
        double eff)
        Constructor used for calculating statistics when performing initial variance analysis
        Parameters:
        curRecord - The database record for which to calculate statistics
        selectedMod - Which modality/difference
        useBiasM - Whether or not to use biased variance components
        sig - Significance level
        eff - Effect size

               int r,
               int n,
               int d,
               double totalVar)
        Calculates degrees of freedom by Obuchowsku, BDG method
        Parameters:
        BCKbias - Biased components of variance for BCK decomposition

        n - Number of normal cases
        d - Number of disease cases
        totalVar - Total variance of components

        Degrees of freedom
